00003 double TimeManager::CalculateFrameRate(bool writeToConsole = false)
00004 {
00005         static double framesPerSecond = 0.0f;                                                           
00006         static double startTime = GetTime();                                                            
00007         static double lastTime = GetTime();                                                                     
00008         static char strFrameRate[50] = { 0 };                                                           
00009         static double currentFPS = 0.0f;                                                                        
00010 
00011         CurrentTime = GetTime();
00012 
00013         // Calculate delta time
00014         DeltaTime = CurrentTime - lastTime;
00015         lastTime = CurrentTime;
00016 
00017         // Increase frame counter
00018         ++framesPerSecond;
00019         
00020         if ( CurrentTime - startTime > 0.5f )
00021         {
00022                 startTime = CurrentTime;
00023 
00024                 // Display fps in console
00025                 if (writeToConsole)
00026                         std::cout << "Current Frames Per Second: " << (int)framesPerSecond << std::endl;
00027         
00028                 currentFPS = framesPerSecond;
00029                 framesPerSecond = 0;
00030         }
00031 
00032         return currentFPS;
00033 }
00034 
00035 double TimeManager::GetTime()
00036 {
00037         auto beginningOfTime = std::chrono::system_clock::now().time_since_epoch();
00038 
00039         auto ms = std::chrono::duration_cast<std::chrono::milliseconds>(beginningOfTime).count();
00040 
00041         return ms * 0.001;
00042 }
00043 
00044 void TimeManager::Sleep(int ms)
00045 {
00046         std::this_thread::sleep_for(std::chrono::milliseconds(ms));
00047 }
